name: MACRO ROM-COM
description:
You start high school and meet your 3 potential love interests!                                           Find out their secrets and choose the path for you!                                                                            

Unlock all 3 endings.                                                                                                                                Average play time: 15 minutes to see all the routes

Originally created as a part of GMTK 2020 Game Jam, theme : "Out of control"

Please report any glitches or errors you encounter.

Enjoy!
